bib.title: Partial Parsing Method Applied to Rules Acquisition for Medical Expert System
bib.author: Piasecki, Maciej and Sas, Jerzy
bib.venue: … Science Department of Wroclaw University of …
bib.abstract: The paper presents the variant of partial parsing method (PPM) applied to acquisition of expert rules from a Polish medical text. PPM is based on the premise that knowledge domain is already defined by knowledge engineer (ie names for classes, attributes, values etc.). The definitions are automatically translated from natural language into formal expressions stored partially in knowledge base and partially in semantic dictionary. PPM preserves composi-tionality principle and is based on sublanguage method. Subsequent
bib.journal: Computer Science Department of Wroclaw University of Technology ul. Wybrzeze Wyspianskiego
